name: Custom "MiXTAPE" Shirt
description:
Good Times / House Party / Love Machine ... Remember all those hours you'd put into making a custom mixtape?  After dubbing and re-dubbing, finally satisfied with the order of the songs, then you'd write the name of the mix on the cassette... yes, we remember those days as well!

This option gives YOU the ability to create and NAME your custom Mixtape shirt.  Please be aware, this shirt isn't for the shy -- people will see your mix from a mile away!

After checking out please email us @ TheDopesThreads@gmail.com to indicate:

- your shirt color
- cassette color
- name of mixtape
- lettering color

If we do not receive a message from you within 12 hours of your order being placed, you will receive a black cassette on a white shirt in your choice of size that reads "The Dopest"

*Important* when indicating what you want it to say, please type the name/phrase exactly how you wish it to appear on your item. This is CASE SENSITIVE. How ever you type it will be how it appears on the customized item.

***This item is made to order. Please allow 10-14 business days for delivery. If you need an item sooner please contact us at TheDopesThreads@gmail.com ***

name: Custom "CYPHERS" - Snapback
description:
CYPHER - "the term in hip-hop culture for the circle b-boy dancers, emcees, slam poets, and musicians often naturally form. “The cypher is where the energy is — it’s as much the feeling as it is the formation … Dancers and performers spend a lot of time competing and performing on stages and for crowds, but it’s in the cypher that they truly earn the respect of each other.”

Even better? A portion of sales will go directly to benefit the only all hip-hop spot for the community in AZ, CYPHERS: The Center for Urban Arts.

This option gives you the ability to CHOOSE YOUR WEAPON. Name your hat color and design color and we'll bust it for you. These are made to order, so please allow 1-2 weeks for item to be made.

Hand-made with high-quality vinyl. Vinyl designs last longer than regular silkscreen - no fading/cracking/washing off!

Brand-new adjustable trucker/baseball/snapback. Front panel is sturdy foam, mesh wraps around the cap to the plastic snapback/adjustable part.
